Description: Glazed pottery oil lamp; mold-made; light brown clay fabric, covered all over with a light green glaze, over relief decoration of vine scrolls; rectangular body resting on four corner nobs, ledge handle, rising rim for the filling hole and two nozzles
Dimensions: Height: 4.20 centimetres (with rim of filling hole)
Curator's comments: Cf. R. Mason & J. Tugwell, 'Fatimid Tall-Necked Lamps and Their Associates: A Typology', Journal of the American Research Center in Egypt 47 (2011) 335-53, esp. 341-2.
